document_data.mainbody:
Fort Locke was a garrison southern end of the Mere of Dead Men along the Sword Coast. 
Located between Highcliff and West Harbor, Fort Locke was built as a garrison. It was a point where the patrolls would report for duty.
Most of inhabitants of the Fort are Greycloak soldiers, though the Fort also accepted refugees and those willing to help.
It is the place where the King of Shadows fought his first and second battle. In the first battle, the warriors pushed his forces to West Harbor. The dead soldiers were buried in a graveyard near the Fort. In the second battle, however, the Fort was destroyed.
